settings.title: Returns & Refund Policy
settings.subtitle: We want you to love your purchase. If not, we'll make it right.

settings.content:
We stand behind every product we sell. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days of delivery for a full refundâ€”no questions asked.

Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we've made the return process as simple and hassle-free as possible.

settings.step_1_text: Email us at support@oneeko.com or use our contact form. Include your order number and let us know which item you'd like to return and why. We're here to help!
settings.step_2_text: We'll send you a return authorization (RA) number and detailed shipping instructions within 24 hours. This helps us process your return quickly and efficiently.
settings.step_3_text: Pack the item securely in its original packaging (if possible), include the RA number, and ship it to the address provided. We recommend using a trackable shipping method and keeping your receipt.
settings.step_4_text: Once we receive and inspect your return (typically 2 business days), we'll process your refund within 3-5 business days. You'll receive an email confirmation when it's complete.

settings.content:
To ensure a smooth return process, please make sure items meet these conditions:

  • Within 30 days: Items must be returned within 30 days of the delivery date
  • Original condition: Items must be unused, unwashed, unworn, and in the same condition you received them
  • Original packaging: Items should be in original packaging with all accessories and documentation when possible
  • Tags attached: All original tags, labels, and security tags must be attached
  • Proof of purchase: You must have your order confirmation or receipt

Non-returnable items: Customized or personalized products, final sale items, and opened hygiene products cannot be returned for health and safety reasons.

Here's what to expect after shipping your return:

  • Transit time: 3-7 business days for your return to reach our warehouse (varies by location)
  • Inspection: 1-2 business days for us to inspect and approve your return
  • Refund processing: 3-5 business days for the refund to be processed to your original payment method
  • Bank processing: 5-10 business days for the credit to appear in your account (varies by financial institution)

Shipping costs: Original shipping charges are non-refundable. Return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility unless the item is defective or we made a shipping error.

Restocking fee: We do not charge restocking fees on standard returns.

Need a different size, color, or model? We've got you covered!

Free exchanges: We offer free exchanges for items of equal or lesser value within the 30-day return window. If the replacement item costs more, you'll only pay the difference.

Faster delivery: Exchanges are processed faster than refunds! We'll ship your new item as soon as we receive your return, so you get what you need quickly.

How to request: Simply indicate that you'd like an exchange (instead of a refund) when you contact us, and let us know which item you'd prefer.

Defective items: If you receive a defective or damaged item, contact us immediately. We'll send a replacement at no cost and provide a prepaid return label for the defective item.

Our customer support team is ready to assist you!

Email: support@oneeko.com
Response time: Within 24 hours (usually much faster!)

We're committed to making your return experience smooth, fast, and hassle-free. Your satisfaction is our #1 priority.
